text: ve tumase (pratishthit) maheenon ke vishay mein poochhate hai. kaho, "ve to logon ke lie aur haj ke lie niyat hai. aur yah koee khoobee aur nekee nahin hain ki tum gharon mein unake peechhe se aao, balki nekee to usakee hai jo (allaah ka) dar rakhe. tum gharon mein unake daravaadon se aao aur allaah se darate raho, taaki tumhen saphalata praapt ho
